contents.text: Thank you for calling Verbal plus Visual in New York, where we craft considered e-commerce experiences for thoughtful brands.
To discuss a new e-commerce project, press 1.
To schedule a strategy consultation, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our strategy team.

navigationGoals: Schedule a strategy consultation for my new e-commerce project
I’m a veteran small-business owner looking to schedule a strategy consultation for my new e-commerce site.
I want to schedule a strategy consultation for a new headless CMS–driven e-commerce build with scalable APIs.
I’d like to schedule a strategy call to plan a new online store.
Schedule a strategy consultation to develop an e-commerce site for physics demonstration kits.

contents.text: To request a quote or pricing information, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our pricing specialists.

navigationGoals: Request pricing information for an upcoming e-commerce engagement
I’d like a detailed pricing quote for building my veteran-owned online store.
I want a detailed quote for integrating a PIM system and personalization engine into our Shopify Plus storefront.
I need pricing information and a quote for an e-commerce project.
Request a detailed pricing quote for building an online store to sell used physics textbooks.

contents.text: For support with an existing Verbal plus Visual project, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a technical issue with my existing Verbal plus Visual project
I need technical support troubleshooting my existing e-commerce site.
I need technical support to debug a 502 error in our GraphQL storefront API.
I need technical support for my existing website—I’m having trouble updating it.
Troubleshoot a payment gateway error on my existing physics merchandise website.

contents.text: For account and billing inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Clarify billing details on my current project invoice
I have a question about my latest invoice and any veteran discounts on my project.
I need to review my latest invoice and update my billing information.
I need help with my billing and account charges.
Clarify a recent billing charge on the maintenance invoice for my physics e-commerce site.
